trans-unit.source: Applies To: Windows PowerShell 4.0, Windows PowerShell 5.0
trans-unit.target: Applies To: Windows PowerShell 4.0, Windows PowerShell 5.0

trans-unit.source: The examples provided throughout this documentation are meant to explain how PowerShell Desired State Configuration (DSC) pull servers work, and are not suitable for most real-world cases.
trans-unit.target: The examples provided throughout this documentation are meant to explain how PowerShell Desired State Configuration (DSC) pull servers work, and are not suitable for most real-world cases.

trans-unit.source: For a more in-depth discussion of how to set up a pull server in a real-world deployment, see <linkText>Configuration Planning and Installation Guide</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: For a more in-depth discussion of how to set up a pull server in a real-world deployment, see <linkText>Configuration Planning and Installation Guide</linkText><title></title>.
